lead_paragraph: Goldman Sachs is losing its edge in fixed-income trading, the firm's biggest business and the one that led to record earnings last year, Bloomberg News reported.
snippet: Goldman Sachs is losing its edge in fixed-income trading, the firm's biggest business and the one that led to record earnings last year, Bloomberg News reported.

headline.main: Goldman Losing Its Edge in Fixed-Income Trading
